comments.author: Paul Elschot
comments.body:
On review, I saw I used private access for the javadocs-internal, 
and iirc this is currently package access.

description:
This removes the duplication introduced in build.xml 
when the javadocs-internal build target was added. 
 
Regards, 
Paul Elschot
summary: [PATCH] Ant macro for javadocs and javadocs-internal
